text: Wow. Well you know more than me :wink::laughing:

Great you are getting paid for your training at work. That’s rare. 
I love Santorini! So beautiful! 

How are your vfx projects going?

My Vfx projects are not going anywhere i am afraid... i have been unable to find the motivation after a day’s work to think or to come up with a concept or the 3d models/ assets. I don’t know what to produce in terms of Vfx because I don’t know exactly what i want to do.
Probably compositing but still have no idea what to produce and what standard to try to reach

Ah. I can help :smiley: 
I can give you a brief if you want. Yea it’s hard to do extra products after works. But be careful to not loose your Maya and Nuke practice. It’s mike a language. If you don’t keep practicing, then you can start to forget the details. 

How about using Maya to creat some elements for your job? Double whammy!

Hahah i have been more attracted lately to creating my own games ( i want to self publish a few) but will try to do some
Clean-up, tracking etc
